Summary: 3 large white lights in a row hovering low in the sky. I was driving South on Rt. 1A. Appeared to be an aircraft of some kind, but remained in the same spot without moving at all.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving South on Rt. 1A in Walpole, MA, towards the center of town at approximatley 10:30 p.m. I noticed what appeared to be some type of aircraft, or possibly lights at the top of a tower. There is no tower in that vicinity. What I saw was 3 large circular, white, bright lights in a row, about 200 ft. above the tree line. It seemed to be way to low for an aircraft. The lights appeared to be part of a rectangular craft of some type. What struck me is that it did not move. I decided to pull into a small shopping plaza parking lot, because I seemed to be getting closer to it. I did not take my eye off of it, until I turned off the main road. As soon as I took the turn into the parking lot I looked back to the spot where it was previously, and it was gone. This all took a matter of a few minutes. I emailed my friend the following morning, who was traveling in the same direction at approximatley the same time if he had seen anything while driving home, without describing anything I had seen. He replied that he had and described exactly what I had seen.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Walpole
This sighting has never been favorited.
